name: GPA Comparison Calculator
description: The Board of Undergraduate Studies introduces a revised Grade Point Average (GPA) effective Semester I 2014/2015. Visit the http://www.uwi.edu/undergraduatestudies/gpascheme.aspx page to learn about the changes and the benefits.
copyright: Copyright Â© 2013 The University of the West Indies
_comment_defaultCampus: Can be set to null, open, mona, cave or sta
_comment_dynamicTheme: Set value to true or false
_comment_defaultFaculty: Can be set to null or the shortName of a faculty
_comment_userURI: Expects json response. Can be a URI such as 'http://localhost/restfulGpaServer/index.php/gpa_api/token' or a .json file
_comment_studentProgrammeRecordURI: Expects json response. Can be a URI such as 'http://my.open.uwi.edu/rest/sar' or a .json file
_comment_coursesURI: Expects json response. Can be a URI such as 'http://localhost/restfulGpaServer/index.php/gpa_api/token' or a .json file
_comment_design: Set value to design1 or design2
_comment_collapseCombinedCumulativeFormu: Set value to true or false
_comment_collapseCombinedDegreeFormula: Set value to true or false
